title: The golde[n] boke of christen matrimonye moost necessary [and] profitable for all the[m], that entend to liue quietly and godlye in the Christen state of holy wedlock newly set forthe in English by Theodore Basille.
author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Botulph lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by Ioh[a]n Mayler for Ioh[a]n Gough,
